title: Android 13 DP1: New system-wide photo picker streamlines sharing
content:
The first preview of Android 13 has arrived, and with it some new tweaks to how the OS we’ve come to know and love. Included in the first developer preview of Android 13 is Google’s new system-wide photo picker, which is meant to streamline the experience.

more…

The post Android 13 DP1: New system-wide photo picker streamlines sharing appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Live in the first developer preview, Android 13 has added a new photo picker that serves apps across the system. Here's how it works.
